mapper.select: select count(*) as num from TB_CSM_MANAGEMENT_TEAM a ,TB_CSM_CORPORATION b where b.party_id=#{partyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.user_placing_cd='01' and b.is_third_cust='1' and b.third_cust_type_cd='1' and a.party_id = b.party_id
